mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weekly_report (user_id, start_date, end_date, achievement_rate, daily_limit, average_daily_spending, spending_by_day) VALUES (#{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{achievementRate}, #{dailyLimit}, #{averageDailySpending}, #{spendingByDay})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM weekly_report WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1
